C

chat - package chat
 
Client - Class in chat
This class holds the gui for the Client and listens to commands from it and sends them to to ClientCode Once connect is pressed, new ClientCode object is created
Client() - Constructor for class chat.Client
Creates new form Client
ClientCode - Class in chat
This class is is the main client object, holds all of the relevant variables and objects Once startRunning() is called it connects to the server and creates a new Thread which listens to messages from the server.
ClientCode(String, String, JTextField, JTextArea) - Constructor for class chat.ClientCode
Constructor
ClientHolder - Class in chat
Class used to make objects holding each clients name and output socket
ClientHolder(String, ObjectOutputStream) - Constructor for class chat.ClientHolder
Constructor
ClientListner - Class in chat
This class is used as a Thread to Listen to messaged from the server
ClientListner(ObjectInputStream, ObjectOutputStream, JTextArea, Socket) - Constructor for class chat.ClientListner
Constructor
closeConnection() - Method in class chat.ClientCode
closes Socket and streams
closeConnection() - Method in class chat.ClientListner
Closes the socket and streams
closeConnection() - Method in class chat.ServerCode
 
ConnectionListner - Class in chat
This class is used a Thread to listen to every client's messages separately Every time a new client joins a new Thread of this type is created
ConnectionListner(String, JTextArea, Socket, ObjectInputStream, ObjectOutputStream, ArrayList<ClientHolder>) - Constructor for class chat.ConnectionListner
